kw.name: Then User clicks on login in authentication screen

test.name: User to test submitting a application

kw.name: And User clicks on submit application
And User scrolls down and clicks on submit new application
Click Submit New Application
kw.doc: scroll dowm and click on submit new application

kw.name: And User Enters All the mandatory fields with firstname as "Test"
kw.sourcename: User Enters All the mandatory fields with firstname as "${firstname}"

kw.name: Enter Postcode
kw.doc: enter postal code as 1000 and click enter

kw.name: Select Country India
kw.doc: select country as india by value "IN

kw.name: Upload Image
kw.doc: upload a image from local machine

kw.name: Select Tools
kw.doc: click on robot framework readio button

kw.name: Enter Career Objective
kw.doc: switch to frame 0 and enter carrer objective

kw.name: Then User should verify the deatils entered in summary page
Verify Summary Details
